translation.en: Oh, it's so cold.
It's like a thousand needles poking into you.
translation.it: È come essere trafitti da mille aghi.

translation.en: It finally feels like Christmas.
I can't believe you grew up with this.
Is this Philly or the ice planet Hoth? [laughs]
translation.it: È Filadelfia o Hoth, pianeta di ghiaccio?

translation.en: Yeah, listen.
Uh, when you first meet my dad, maybe cool it with the Star Wars talk.
translation.it: Quando incontrerai mio padre, evita di parlare di Guerre Stellari.

translation.en: Just until he gets to know you. And then...
-I don't know, maybe also after. -Aww.
You're so cute when you're trying to hide who I am.
translation.it: Sei carina a provare a nascondere chi sono.

translation.en: Emmy, I got this.
I know. Just... I want him to love you as much as I love you.
translation.it: Lo so. Voglio che ti ami quanto ti amo io.

translation.en: Okay. Well, my dad said he'd be here at 8:45, and it's 8:40...
translation.it: Ha detto che sarebbe stato qui alle 8:45 e sono le 8:40...

translation.en: ...five.
Hey! There he is!
-Hey, Dad! Merry almost-Christmas! -Mmm.
Welcome home, sweetie!
This must be Matt.
Good to finally meet you in person. [chuckles]
How was the flight?
Ah, you know, red-eyes are tough. Always hard to get much sleep.
translation.it: È sempre dura dormire sui voli notturni.

translation.en: I can sleep anywhere.
I trained my body to sleep through air strikes
translation.it: Ho imparato a dormire sotto i raid aerei

translation.en: when I led a platoon in Desert Storm.
Wow. I just... take half an Ambien and drink red wine. Your thing's cooler.
translation.it: Io... prendo solo un sonnifero e bevo vino. Lei vince decisamente.

translation.en: Mixing drugs and alcohol.
translation.it: Un mix di droga e alcol.

translation.en: Interesting.
Okay! Here we go. [claps hands] Let's...
-All right. -Yeah.
[Don] Oh, you got your ax.
So, how's your band? -Had any gigs? -[coughs] Oh.
translation.it: Come va la band? Avete fatto dei concerti?

translation.en: A few. Mostly still paying our dues.
Paying dues, not rent, huh?
[chuckles] Just kidding ya.
Good one. [chuckles]
Oh, look at me, back of a cop car.
translation.it: Seduto dietro in un'auto della polizia.

translation.en: It's like I'm a perp, you know, and you're the-- Oh!
I feel like a bad boy back here.
Oh, dang it. I left my mittens on the plane.
Hey, Em.
You remember my buddy, Ted Boseman?
translation.it: Ricordi il mio amico Ted Boseman?

translation.en: -No. -Oh, yeah you do.
Anyway, I ran into him at church last Sunday,
translation.it: L'ho incontrato in chiesa domenica scorsa,

translation.en: and it turns out he's kind of a big deal here at D&P Financial.
translation.it: a quanto pare è un pezzo grosso qui alla D&P Financial.

translation.en: And he wants to chat with you about opportunities right here in Philly.
translation.it: E vuole discutere con te delle opportunità che potrebbero esserci qui a Filadelfia.

translation.en: -Oh. -What, you mean like her move back here?
Seat belt, please.
Dad, I already have a finance job in LA,
translation.it: Papà, ho già un lavoro nella finanza a Los Angeles, dove vivo con il ragazzo che amo.

translation.en: where I live with the guy that I love.
translation.it: a Los Angeles, dove vivo con il ragazzo che amo.

translation.en: -How are you doing back there, sweetie? -Bulletproof glass is hard.
translation.it: - Come va lì? - Il vetro antiproiettile è duro.

translation.en: Yeah, forget I mentioned it.
But, uh...
Ah, keep it in mind. [chuckles]
Got the Christmas lights out, ready to go.
translation.it: Ha tirato fuori le luci natalizie.

translation.en: Love it. Love it. [chuckles]
We put our lights up today, and we take them down on New Year's Day.
translation.it: Oggi mettiamo le luci e le togliamo il giorno di Capodanno.

translation.en: Emmy's mom, she had a rule.
translation.it: La madre di Emmy aveva una regola.

translation.en: Ten days, that's it. This ain't Las Vegas.
translation.it: Dieci giorni. Non siamo a Las Vegas.

translation.en: Everybody's coming over tonight for the Quinn family house lighting.
translation.it: Stasera accenderemo le luci tutti insieme.

translation.en: Tradition's my dad's favorite thing.
Right up there with Law & Order. [chuckles] The show and the thing.
translation.it: E Law & Order. La serie e tutto il resto.

translation.en: Our house lighting, tree trimming, caroling, midnight mass,
translation.it: Le luci, il taglio dell'albero, i canti natalizi, la messa di mezzanotte,

translation.en: Christmas brunch, Christmas dinner,
translation.it: il brunch di Natale, la cena di Natale,

translation.en: a sensible New Year's Eve celebration.
The world might change...
The Quinns...
never will.
Remember when you asked why I moved across the country?
translation.it: Ti chiedi perché me ne sono andata?

translation.en: Here it is!
The house that made all this.
translation.it: La casa che ha creato tutto questo.

translation.en: This is nice.
I want the full tour, -but can I take a quick nap? -Yeah.
translation.it: Mi mostrerai tutto, ma posso dormire un po'?

translation.en: I just want to be on my game when I meet the--
Oh, my God!
[gasps] The prodigal sister returns. Give me hugs, come here! I want them! Oh!
Matt, this is my sister Patsy and her husband Todd.
translation.it: Matt, lei è mia sorella Patsy e suo marito Todd.

translation.en: Mr. Rock 'n' Roller. Coming in for a hug. I'm a hugger.
Okay. [squeals]
-Thanks for coming over to welcome us. -Oh, your dad said we had to.
translation.it: - Grazie per essere venuti. - Tuo padre ci ha costretti.

translation.en: [clears throat] And I said, "Heck, I want to."
So, who's hungry? I'm making eggies like Mom used to make.
translation.it: Fame? Faccio le uova matte come le faceva mamma.

translation.en: Not as good, obviously. But not bad, if I do say so myself.
translation.it: Non così buone, certo. Ma non male, se lo dico anch'io.

translation.en: And I do!
Please have an eggie.
-We arrested a mall Santa last night. -[Emmy] Mm.
translation.it: Ieri abbiamo arrestato un Babbo Natale.

translation.en: He lost a toe breaking into Victoria's Secret.
translation.it: Ha perso un dito entrando da Victoria's Secret.

translation.en: Nancy, the nurse at the hospital, she says,
"Somebody just made his own naughty list."
translation.it: "È finito nella sua lista dei cattivi".

translation.en: She's a hoot.
Oh. Well, there'll be coal in his lace stocking, huh?
translation.it: Troverà il carbone nella calza in pizzo.

translation.en: Want to go get some sleep, Matt?
I really do.
-Well, look who's here from Hollyweird. -Hi!
translation.it: Guarda chi è arrivato da Hollywood.

translation.en: Oh. Matt, this is my brother Sean, his wife Joy.
translation.it: Mio fratello Sean e sua moglie Joy.

translation.en: -Hey, Matt! -Sean Jr. Hi!
Donny. Oh, Baby Margie!
There'll be a test on these names later.
Not really.
My name's easy. You look at me, what do you see?
translation.it: Il mio nome è facile. Guardami, cosa vedi?

translation.en: Joy. Donny, stop playing with the knives.
translation.it: Joy. Donny, non toccare i coltelli.

translation.en: Sean Jr., you are getting so big. You look like you could be an Avenger.
translation.it: Sean Jr.? Stai diventando grande. Potresti diventare un Avenger.

translation.en: You don't need to do that.
Yeah! He's in a fun new phase.
translation.it: Già! È in una nuova fase.

translation.en: So, Matt. LA boy. You a Rams fan?
translation.it: Allora, Matt. Il ragazzo di Los Angeles. Tifi i Rams?

translation.en: Uh, I don't really like football.
I love it.
You know, Super Bowls, touchdowns,
translation.it: Super Bowl, touchdown, mi piace tutto.

translation.en: just all of it.
Tom Brady. I mean, he's one of 'em.
translation.it: Tom Brady. È uno di loro.

translation.en: [laughs] You got me. I was like, "Uh-oh, Em got a dud."
translation.it: Mi hai fregato. Ho pensato: "Emmy sta con un fallito".

translation.en: Pats, we doing eggies?
-Which way is the bathroom? -Right there.
You know, it's just-- It's pee.
He seems nice.
But is he worth staying in California,
translation.it: Ma vale la pena stare a LA con lui, con i terremoti,

translation.en: with all the earthquakes and the fires and Californians?
translation.it: Ma vale la pena stare a LA con lui, con i terremoti, gli incendi e i californiani?

translation.en: [Alan] At least admit that it was inconsiderate.
[Kayla] Oh, my God. It's not that big of a deal, Alan.
translation.it: Santo cielo. Non è una tragedia, Alan.

translation.en: I just wish you'd shown me the Christmas card before mailing them to everyone we know.
translation.it: Vorrei mi avessi mostrato i biglietti prima di spedirli.

translation.en: Great! You can be in charge next year.
-Good! -Awesome!
-Fantastic! -Can you double-cheese that thing?
Hi, sis. Sorry we're late.
Someone only started caring about the Christmas cards after I mailed them out this morning.
translation.it: Qualcuno ha iniziato a pensare ai biglietti dopo che li ho spediti.

translation.en: Gosh, who could "someone" be?
How do we crack that code?
Who wants an eggie? Kayla, Alan? You want an eggie?
-I want a divorce. -What? -What? -What?
Okay, I'm sorry I didn't show you the cards.
translation.it: Ok, scusa se non ti ho mostrato i biglietti.

translation.en: Now, can we please move on?
No. I-I want a divorce.
I didn't mean for it to come out like this, but...
[inhales deeply] ...you have to admit we're not happy.
You're leaving me?
Now?
Well, there's not really a good time.
Yes, there is.
When you die. That's when you leave, Alan.
Till death do us part. Death, Alan, not Christmas.
translation.it: - Finché morte non ci separi. - La morte, Alan, non il Natale.

translation.en: Hey. Let me guess. Kayla and Alan.
[chuckles] Patsy, I think I'm ready for that name test.
translation.it: Patsy, sono pronto per il test.

translation.en: We fight every day. We haven't had sex in a year!
translation.it: Litighiamo ogni giorno. Non facciamo sesso da un anno.

translation.en: I can't believe you're talking about this in front of my entire family.
translation.it: Come puoi dirlo davanti a tutta la mia famiglia.

translation.en: And that guy.
You're with your entire family all the time.
translation.it: Stai sempre con tutta la tua famiglia.

translation.en: Everything happens in front of them, and because of them.
translation.it: Tutto accade davanti a loro e a causa loro.

translation.en: We're the reason you're bailing on your marriage?
translation.it: Stai lasciando tua moglie a causa nostra?

translation.en: We're the problem?
We're delightful.
Kay.
We don't have kids.
So, yeah,
I think it's best to rip the Band-Aid off and move on.
translation.it: meglio uno strappo secco e voltiamo pagina.

translation.en: And Don, did you just unsnap the holster of your service revolver?
translation.it: E Don, ha aperto la fondina dell'arma di servizio?

translation.en: If you want to leave,
then go.
Now.
Back door, buddy.
Your mom's eggies?
Always too salty.
No wonder he didn't want our cards to go out.
translation.it: Ecco perché non voleva i biglietti.

translation.en: "Happy Holidays from Kayla and Alan?"
It was a lie.
Honey, uh...
You put "Happy Holidays," not "Merry Christmas?"
He means that we love you
-and we're here for you. -Yes. Honey.
-Of course. -[Kayla] What am I gonna do?
I woke up this morning and everything was fine, and now...
translation.it: Stamattina era tutto a posto. E ora...

translation.en: Now, I don't even want to go home.
But you could stay here.
As long as you want. This will always be your home.
translation.it: Quanto vuoi. Questa sarà sempre casa tua.

translation.en: [Emmy] Yeah.
And I'll be here.
[Patsy] Ooh, it'll be just like the old days.
I'm sorry, Mom.
A Quinn getting divorced.
I don't know what happened.
Well? Hug me!
Oh, Jesus!
Sorry.
-What are you guys doing? -Nothing.
Just... this eggnog went bad.
Yeah, it's just a bad...
-nog situation. -[Matt] Oh.
Looked like you were pouring one out to someone.
[laughs] No. No.
I feel so bad for Kayla.
Yeah.
But...
you know...
Two sides to every story.
Alan has his issues, but Kayla can be a bit of a--
translation.it: Alan ha i suoi difetti, ma Kayla può essere...

translation.en: -Pill. -A big pill.
Wow. Okay.
You know, I-I like getting the in-laws take on this stuff,
translation.it: Mi piace questa cosa tra i parenti acquisiti,

translation.en: 'cause I'm hoping to be one of you guys soon.
translation.it: spero di diventare uno di voi.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Emmy to marry me.
Christmas morning.
We need to tell him.
-No, we can't trust him. -He needs to know.
Obviously, I can hear you.
Hi.
Okay, look. Emmy's great. You guys should totally get married.
translation.it: Emmy è fantastica. Dovreste proprio sposarvi.

translation.en: Just do it far away from here.
LA's good. Hawaii's better.
translation.it: LA va bene. Le Hawaii meglio.

translation.en: Guam is still America.
translation.it: Guam è pur sempre in America.

translation.en: -[Kayla] I don't know what happened. -B-B-Be cool.
translation.it: - Non so cos'è successo... - State calmi.

translation.en: -[Patsy] We're here for you. -[Don] Of course.
We were pouring one out.
To Alan.
We have a sort of support group.
Support group for what?
The people who married into this family.
translation.it: Per i parenti acquisiti della famiglia.

translation.en: The Quinns are great.
But when they're together, which is almost every day...
translation.it: Ma tutti insieme, e accade spesso...

translation.en: Pizza Fridays, Sunday brunches, pop-ins, stop-bys, meetups, hangouts.
translation.it: La pizza del venerdì, brunch domenicali, visite veloci e di passaggio, ritrovi.

translation.en: Don has a saying: "There's the Quinn way and the wrong way."
translation.it: Don dice: "C'è il modo dei Quinn e quello sbagliato".

translation.en: How to spend your money. How to vote. Where to vacation.
translation.it: Come spendere i soldi. Come votare. Le vacanze.

translation.en: -What kind of soda to drink. -Pepsi.
It's always got to be Pepsi.
And our spouses think the Quinn way is normal.
translation.it: E i nostri sposi credono che sia normale.

translation.en: But it's like a cult.
A G-rated cult.
translation.it: Una setta adatta a tutte le età.

translation.en: We secretly meet at this bar, Otto's. Just to talk stuff out.
translation.it: Ci incontriamo di nascosto in un bar, da Otto. Per parlare.

translation.en: And the family will never catch us there because Quinns don't drink.
translation.it: Non lo sapranno mai perché i Quinn non bevono.

translation.en: Don says alcohol is a crutch, which I guess is true, but also, you know, shut up. [chuckles]
translation.it: Don dice che l'alcol è un alibi, ed è vero, ma comunque, stai zitto.

translation.en: We, uh, call ourselves the Outlaw In-laws.
-No, we don't. Todd does. -It's good.
translation.it: - Todd ci chiama così. - È carino.

translation.en: Outlaw In-laws! [laughs]
Thanks. But Emmy's not like that at all.
translation.it: Grazie. Ma Emmy non è affatto così.

translation.en: She drinks Coke and alcohol.
That's because she's been away.
But in the four or five days you're here, she'll get sucked back in.
translation.it: In questi pochi giorni, verrà risucchiata di nuovo.

translation.en: We're here for ten days.
-Oh, Lord. -Oh, you poor bastard.
I'm so glad you're here.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu sia qui.

translation.en: Me too.
How do you think I'm doing so far?
Great.
In fact, you'd better pace yourself with all that charm. We still got a lot of trip left.
translation.it: Cerca di risparmiare un po' di fascino. Abbiamo ancora molti giorni.

translation.en: Oh, well, I have a lot of charm left.
-With razzle-dazzle to spare. -[laughs]
[chuckles] Can I take a nap now?
-[Kayla] Oh, look. -Oh!
The lovebirds.
Hey, Kayla.
How you feelin'?
Sad. [exhales]
Angry.
Confused.
A little hungry.
Well, how about a little food for the soul?
translation.it: Che ne dite di un po' di cibo per l'anima?

translation.en: Any requests?
Do you know the song "Not Now" by you?
So, Matt.
Kayla and I shared this room when we were kids.
translation.it: Io e Kayla dormivamo qui da piccole.

translation.en: -Yeah. Now it's her and you. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ora siete tu e lei. - Già.

translation.en: I just keep getting cut out of people's lives.
Oh, well...
Do you want to stay in here with me tonight?
translation.it: Vuoi stare qui con me stasera?

translation.en: Matt could take the spare room. Right, Matt?
translation.it: C'è la stanza degli ospiti per Matt.

translation.en: Oh, yes. That would make me feel so much better.
-Oh, good. -Thank you.
Oh, you want me to go now?
-Mm-hmm. -[softly] Thank you.
Man, puberty hit the Keller kids hard.
translation.it: La pubertà ha colpito i ragazzi Keller.

translation.en: -Hey, can I talk to you guys? -Sure, sweetie.
Oh, a sit-down talk.
You're not pregnant, are you?
So... [exhales]
I know you've been wondering why I've been all, like, quiet lately.
translation.it: So che vi siete chiesti perché ultimamente sono così taciturno.

translation.en: [exhales] I've been trying to figure out how to tell you.
I, um...
I have these feelings.
In me.
I tried talking myself out of it,
feeling this way, but...
...it's who I am.
Sorry, go ahead.
Or we could do this later. Up to you. You want to do it later?
translation.it: Oppure no. Decidi tu. Ne parliamo più tardi?

translation.en: [Sean Jr. sighs] No.
I wanted you to know that I'm...
I'm an atheist.
Oh, we love you no matter--
What?
He's an atheist.
I thought he was gonna say...
I'm having more water.
I was nervous to tell you 'cause you raised me all Catholic
translation.it: Avevo paura di dirvelo, mi avete cresciuto cattolico, non volevo deludervi.

translation.en: and I didn't want to upset you.
translation.it: mi avete cresciuto cattolico, non volevo deludervi.

translation.en: Oh, we're not upset.
Right, Sean?
So, do I tell Poppy Don
translation.it: Dico a nonno Don che non vado in chiesa alla vigilia

translation.en: I'm not going to church on Christmas Eve, or should you?
translation.it: Dico a nonno Don che non vado in chiesa alla vigilia o lo fate voi?

translation.en: How's that now?
I mean, obviously I'm not gonna go and just pretend to believe in God.
translation.it: Ovviamente non andrò lì a fingere di credere in Dio.

translation.en: [laughs] Right. No. Obviously not.
Kayla, guess what I did to make you feel better.
translation.it: Kayla, indovina cosa ho fatto per te.

translation.en: Invented a time machine and undid all my life choices.
translation.it: Una macchina del tempo che annulla le mie scelte.

translation.en: Almost. Um, yeah.
I, uh, dug up Mom's old Christmas cookie cutters, and...
translation.it: Ho cercato tra le vecchie formine per biscotti di mamma e...

translation.en: They remind me of Mom.
-Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't think that-- -I still want them.
You don't need to keep trying to be Mom for her.
translation.it: Non devi cercare di farle da mamma.

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
-Gonna keep trying to be Mom for her? -So much.
This is going to look great.
I mean, that angel is...
angelic.
It goes on the roof.
Represents Emmy's mom, looking down on all of us.
translation.it: Rappresenta la madre di Emmy che ci guarda dall'alto.

translation.en: Yeah, we've had this house lighting tradition for years.
translation.it: Le luci sono una tradizione che abbiamo da anni.

translation.en: We let the grandkids flip on the lights. We sing carols, drink hot cider.
translation.it: I nipoti accendono le lucine. Cantiamo, beviamo sidro caldo.

translation.en: Oh, I love hot cider.
People are always coming up to me, like, "Hot chocolate rules."
translation.it: Tutti dicono: "La cioccolata è la migliore".

translation.en: I'm like, "Get away, dude. No way.
I'm a cider guy. Hot cider for me, thanks."
We're gonna have hot chocolate, too.
Also really good.
Anyway...
I'm in love with your daughter, Mr. Quinn.
And when a man loves a woman who...
translation.it: E quando un uomo ama una donna...

translation.en: has a father...
traditionally...
Are you asking for my blessing to marry Emmy?
translation.it: Mi stai chiedendo di poter sposare Emmy?

translation.en: Yes, I-I was.
I am.
You are the first of my three daughters' suitors to have the guts to do this.
translation.it: Sei il primo tra tutti ad avere il coraggio di farlo.

translation.en: I really appreciate it.
You are quite welcome. [chuckles]
Which makes it that much harder to say no.
translation.it: Questo rende più difficile dire di no.

translation.en: You know, after this whole Alan thing, I just...
translation.it: Dopo tutta questa storia di Alan, ho capito...

translation.en: realized I got to be more careful about who I let into this family.
translation.it: di dover stare attento a chi lascio entrare in famiglia.

translation.en: [sighs] But thanks for asking.
It means a lot.
Not enough, but a lot.
So he stomped on your hopes and dreams. Welcome to the club, buddy.
translation.it: Ha calpestato le tue speranze e i tuoi sogni. Benvenuto nel club.

translation.en: I don't need his permission to ask, you know?
translation.it: Non mi serve il suo permesso.

translation.en: I was just trying to be a gentleman.
See, that's why I didn't ask for permission to marry Patsy.
translation.it: Per questo non ho chiesto di poter sposare Patsy.

translation.en: Lost his respect, but avoided his wrath. [chuckles] Wassup!
translation.it: Ho perso il suo rispetto, ma ne ho evitato l'ira.

translation.en: Like I said, hold off on asking Emmy to marry you on this trip.
translation.it: Non chiedere ad Emmy di sposarti durante le feste.

translation.en: But Christmas is the perfect time.
translation.it: Ma Natale è il momento perfetto.

translation.en: You know what? He thinks he can intimidate me.
But when I want something, I go for it.
translation.it: Ma se voglio qualcosa, mi butto.

translation.en: I just need to prove to him that I'm good enough.
No. Not good enough.
Perfect.
-He's like a hurt baby duck. -Mm-hmm.
You want to help, but maybe it's best to let him waddle into the bushes -and die. -Oh.
translation.it: Vuoi aiutarlo, ma forse è meglio lasciarlo morire in un cespuglio.

translation.en: Oh, God.
Hey. Just wanted to check in, see if you needed any help.
translation.it: Volevo sapere se le serviva aiuto.

translation.en: I want to show you that I'm a, uh... a, uh...
a vessel of dependability.
A vessel of--
Are you high, rock star?
'Cause you know I can still bust you for that. This ain't LA.
translation.it: Perché sai che posso ancora arrestarti. Non siamo a Los Angeles.

translation.en: Or Colorado. Or Maine, or Alaska, or...
translation.it: O in Colorado. O in Maine, in Alaska o...

translation.en: Good Lord, it'd take less time to tell you the good states.
translation.it: Si fa prima ad elencare gli Stati buoni.

translation.en: Matt? What are you doing up there?
Just, uh, helping your dad with the lights.
translation.it: Aiuto tuo padre con le luci.

translation.en: Dad, do you want help?
[Don] Sure don't.
Matt, come on, we're making a fire. Come watch Elf with me and Kayla.
translation.it: Vieni, Matt. Accendiamo il fuoco. Vieni a vedere Elf con noi.

translation.en: [Emmy] My family's gonna be here in an hour.
translation.it: Gli altri saranno qui tra un'ora.

translation.en: It's best to just let my dad do things his way. The Quinn way.
translation.it: Meglio che mio padre faccia a modo suo. - Al modo Quinn. - Non sapevo che fosse così tardi.

translation.en: [Don] Actually, I didn't know it was that late.
translation.it: - Al modo Quinn. - Non sapevo che fosse così tardi.

translation.en: I'm gonna need some help to finish in time.
translation.it: Mi serve aiuto per finire in tempo.

translation.en: Great. I'll stay.
I am here for you.
All right.
[grunting] On the roof.
Which is actually a lot higher than you'd think.
translation.it: È più difficile di quanto si pensi.

translation.en: I got a bad feeling about this.
Hey, nice.
That's a line from Star Wars.
It's actually repeated in many of the, uh-- Oh, you don't care.
translation.it: Si ripete in molti... Oh, non le interessa.

translation.en: You know, this is actually still a little crooked.
translation.it: Questo è ancora un po' sbilenco.

translation.en: -Let me fix it real quick. -Hey.
-We still have a lot to do. -[Matt grunts]
I hear you, Mr. Quinn. But as an artist,
I know you probably hate the term "artist."
No, no! Look! Look!
-Sorry. Sorry! -Don't stomp on her! That's my wife!
translation.it: - Scusi! - Non calpestarla! È mia moglie!

translation.en: Wait.
Oh, my-- Oh, my God, it's sticking right in you.
Oh, look at it. Look at it! Look!
I can't. It's in my forehead.
translation.it: Non posso. Ce l'ho in fronte.

translation.en: You are definitely tougher than our nine-toed Santa.
translation.it: Sei più forte del Babbo Natale senza un dito.

translation.en: that's the nice part about getting shot early in my career, Nancy.
translation.it: È il bello di prendersi una pallottola all'inizio della carriera, Nancy.

translation.en: Any pain after that is just playing for second.
My son was ten pounds at birth.
translation.it: Ho avuto un figlio di cinque chili.

translation.en: Every pain since, I'm like, "If it ain't a giant baby being yanked out of me,
translation.it: Da allora dico: "Se non è un bimbo enorme che esce da me,

translation.en: bring it."
[Don] This kid staples me in the head and he's the one who faints.
translation.it: Questo mi spilla la testa ed è lui quello che sviene.

translation.en: I can't believe this is the one my daughter brings home.
translation.it: Non posso credere che sia l'uomo di mia figlia.

translation.en: Look, Mr. Quinn. Don.
I know you're used to getting your way, but you--
translation.it: Sarà abituato a fare a modo suo, ma...

translation.en: Oh, my God. Is that sticking in your brain?!
Help me, help--
He's a bigger pain than a ten-pound baby.
translation.it: È peggio di un bambino di cinque chili.

translation.en: You're such a hoot.
You're all alone on the holidays, too.
translation.it: Anche tu sei solo durante le feste.

translation.en: Aunt Kayla's talking to a fish.
translation.it: Zia Kayla parla con un pesce.

translation.en: It's been a long day, bud.
Where'd Sean Jr. go?
He's talking to my dad. I knew I shouldn't have brought him.
translation.it: Sta parlando con papà. Non avrei dovuto portarlo.

translation.en: You don't think he's gonna tell him he's an atheist when he's in the hospital, do you?
translation.it: Non pensi che gli dirà che è ateo, mentre è in ospedale, no?

translation.en: I actually think we should be proud of Sean Jr. for not hiding who he is.
translation.it: Dovremmo essere fieri di lui per non aver nascosto chi è.

translation.en: Maybe everybody shouldn't have to tiptoe around your dad.
translation.it: Forse non dovremmo preoccuparci tanto di tuo padre.

translation.en: Kayla's talking to a fish and she seems less crazy than you right now.
translation.it: Kayla parla con un pesce e sembra meno pazza di te.

translation.en: I tried to be there for Kayla like Mom would've,
translation.it: Ho cercato di fare ciò che avrebbe fatto mamma,

translation.en: but everything I did today just made her feel worse.
translation.it: ma tutto ciò che ho fatto, l'ha fatta stare peggio.

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not cut out for it.
Being a mom.
I know it's taking longer than we thought, but it's gonna happen.
translation.it: Ci vuole più tempo del previsto, ma succederà.

translation.en: Okay? And when it does,
you're gonna be great.
Now Aunt Kayla's stealing the fish.
translation.it: - Va bene? - Zia Kayla sta rubando il pesce.

translation.en: Our kid will be easier than her.
translation.it: Con nostro figlio sarà più facile.

translation.en: Hey, bud. I saw you talking to Poppy Don in there.
translation.it: Ti ho visto parlare con nonno Don.

translation.en: That's fun.
I decided not to tell him.
[exhales] Oh, thank God.
We're good. [laughing] Okay.
I'm gonna go put my face against some cold glass.
translation.it: Vado a mettere la faccia su un vetro freddo.

translation.en: Sweetie,
you know you don't have to be afraid to tell Poppy Don the truth, right?
translation.it: sai che non devi avere paura di dire la verità al nonno, vero?

translation.en: No, I'm not.
I went in there to tell him.
Then I asked how he was doing.
translation.it: Poi gli ho chiesto come stava.

translation.en: And he said he knew he'd be fine
translation.it: E ha detto che sapeva che sarebbe stato bene

translation.en: because Grammy Margaret was up in heaven watching over him
translation.it: E ha detto che sapeva che sarebbe stato bene perché nonna Margaret vegliava su di lui

translation.en: and all of us.
[sighs] I just couldn't do it to the guy.
Well, I guess Dad's house lighting is canceled.
translation.it: Immagino che l'accensione delle luci sia annullata.

translation.en: This is just...
The nurse is making me.
I see what you're trying to do.
Fighting for Emmy.
I'm just doing the same thing.
Hey, so we have loving Emmy in common.
That's something, right?
In that it makes us opponents? Okay.
translation.it: Questo ci rende avversari? Va bene.

translation.en: Did you finish your juice?
Yes.
[sighs] When you're finished, you're clear to go.
You, on the other hand, your heart rate's a bit elevated.
translation.it: Il tuo battito è un po' accelerato.

translation.en: So I get to keep you a little longer.
translation.it: Devo tenerti qui ancora un po'.

translation.en: [Don] Well...
guess there's worse things.
You, uh...
You like her.
Who? Nancy?
[stammers] Uh, I like her as someone that I work with, but I don't like her like her. I mean...
translation.it: Mi piace come una persona con cui lavoro, ma non mi piace lei in sé.

translation.en: But even if I did, it's only been three years since my wife died.
translation.it: Anche se fosse, mia moglie è morta solo tre anni fa.

translation.en: And, uh, again,
I don't like her.
And why am I explaining myself to you? Let's get you out of here.
translation.it: E poi perché dovrei giustificarmi? Andiamocene da qui.

translation.en: Okay, Donny.
Hot cider for you, sir.
You couldn't be home for the lights, so I figured we bring the lights to you.
translation.it: Non poteva vedere l'accensione, ho pensato di portarla qui.

translation.en: [exhales] This is something.
I bet Mom's looking down and smiling.
You guys did all this for them?
translation.it: Avete fatto tutto questo per loro?

translation.en: Eh, this family's a pain in the butt, but they're our pain in the butt.
translation.it: Sono dei rompiscatole, ma sono i nostri rompiscatole.

translation.en: -But yeah, they are a pain in the butt. -Such a pain in the butt. Yeah.
translation.it: - Ma lo sono davvero. - È vero. Già.

translation.en: -Sorry it's been so crazy. -[Matt sighs]
translation.it: Mi dispiace, è stato un delirio.

translation.en: Oh, at least it's going by quick.
We've already been here, what? Three, four days?
translation.it: Siamo qui da quanto? Tre giorni, quattro?

translation.en: -Twelve hours. -Oh, God.
Oh, hi. [chuckles]
Look at you two. Matching bracelets.
-Bracelet buddies. -[Don laughs]
Don't ruin it.
Uh... you know what would make this perfect?
If you'd just agree to meet with Ted Boseman.
-Oh, God. -Not to take a job, just to chat.
translation.it: - Oddio. - Solo per fare due chiacchierare.

translation.en: You know,
as a favor to an old man who just got staple-gunned in the head.
translation.it: un favore a un vecchio che è stato colpito alla testa.

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
Okay. Stop bugging me and I'll do it.
translation.it: Smettila di scocciarmi e lo farò.

translation.en: ♪ It's beginning to look a lot Like Christmas ♪
translation.it: It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas...

translation.en: Wait.
So you are going to meet with that guy?
Oh, just to get my dad off my back. Seriously, don't worry.
translation.it: Solo perché mio padre mi lasci in pace. Non preoccuparti.

translation.en: Worry. Seriously.
Don always gets his way.
-The Quinn way. -Definitely.
I wonder what would happen if we could somehow loosen Don up a bit.
translation.it: Mi chiedo cosa succederebbe se si rilassasse un po'.

translation.en: I mean, that'd be good for all of us, right?
translation.it: Sarebbe un bene per tutti noi, no?

translation.en: The Quinns and Quinn-laws.
translation.it: Per i Quinn e i Quinnacquisiti.

translation.en: [scoffs] Quinn-laws.
Oh, that's good. He's good.
Hey, Ted.
Emmy has agreed to meet with you.
Now, all you have to do is just make her a job offer that she can't refuse,
translation.it: Devi solo farle un'offerta di lavoro che non può rifiutare.

translation.en: and you will have paid me back for not arresting you
translation.it: E mi avrai ripagato per non averti arrestato

translation.en: for drunk and disorderly,
and attempting to intoxicate a police horse.
translation.it: e tentativo di ubriacare un cavallo della polizia.

translation.en: Yeah.
That was a heck of a Thanksgiving night you had there, Ted.
translation.it: È stata una gran bella festa del Ringraziamento, Ted.
